thread.title: Jeff Goldblum says he'll be starring in Wes Anderson's next animated comedy with Ed Norton and Bryan Cranston - Movies
thread.title_full: Jeff Goldblum says he'll be starring in Wes Anderson's next animated comedy with Ed Norton and Bryan Cranston - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Jeff Goldblum says he'll be starring in Wes Anderson's next animated comedy with Ed Norton and Bryan Cranston - Movies
text: The cheeky Jeff Goldblum seems to have let slip some major details about Wes Anderson's next movie.During one of his weekly Los Angeles jazz shows with The Mildred Snitzer Orchestra, Goldblum revealed that he'll lend his voice to a "Japanese-inspired" stop-motion movie about a pack of dogs. © Getty Images / Michael BucknerWes Anderson Goldblum also tipped that Anderson ensemble regulars Ed Norton and Bob Balaban are on board, as is Breaking Bad's Bryan Cranston, reports Nerdist.Anderson last worked in the stop-motion genre on 2009's Fantastic Mr. Fox, which earned a Best Animated Feature Oscar nomination.The filmmaker's 2014 period comedy The Grand Budapest Hotel made more than $158 million at the worldwide box office – and won a total of four Academy Awards this year.Goldblum worked with Anderson on The Grand Budapest Hotel, as well as The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou.Watch a trailer for Fantastic Mr. Fox below:
